actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to improve the National Cancer Program and to authorize increased appropriations for such program for the next 4 fiscal years.

summary.text: National Cancer Amendments - Authorizes increased appropriations for the national cancer program for the next four fiscal years under the Public Health Service Act in order to find a preventative and cure for cancer within such period.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to improve the National Cancer Program and to authorize increased appropriations for such program for the next 4 fiscal years.
